ORDER OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
364 A.2d 266
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Foster Lee TARVER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 3, 1976.
Decided Oct. 8, 1976.
William Saye, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Marion E. MacIntyre, Second Asst. Dist. Atty., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J„ and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
